alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Outagamie; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:01AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Forest, Marinette, Menominee, northwestern Winnebago, Waushara, Waupaca, Oconto, western Outagamie, eastern Langlade and Shawano Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1059 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Antigo to near Clintonville to 8 miles south of Adams. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and 30 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Look for shelter if outside. The thunderstorms will be near... Clintonville around 1105 AM CDT. Embarrass around 1110 AM CDT. Shawano, Carter and Navarino Wildlife Area around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include McCaslin Mountain Natural Area, Wautoma, Gillett, Redgranite, Napowan Scout Camp, Oconto, Pembine and Lake Poygan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
